sect1.para: Below is the list of patches applicable to the NetBSD 1.6.2 release:

itemizedlist.listitem:
A description and resolution procedure for Local DoS via audio device with specific drivers can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-002

A description and resolution procedure for Insufficient argument validation in compat code can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-010

A description and resolution procedure for a ftpd root escalation can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-009

A description and resolution procedure for CVS server vulnerability can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-008

A description and resolution procedure for TCP protocol and implementation vulnerability can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-006

A description and resolution procedure for Denial of service vulnerabilities in OpenSSL can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2004-005
